legacy.full_text: SCOOP: President Biden, in an Oval Office meeting last week with key members of his Cabinet, indicated he's leaning toward removing some products from the Trump administration's China tariffs list. https://t.co/Z01zVVhpZJ

As a Chinese proverb goes: A wise man shall readily accept good advice from others. 

It's about time for Biden admin. to heed the loud cries from everyday Americans and American businesses against staggering, hurting tariffs.
